prompts.title: Python Bug Fixer
prompts.prompt_text:
Analyze this Python error and suggest a fix:

Error: [Paste Error]
Code: [Paste Code]
prompts.example_output: Identifies IndexError and suggests checking list bounds.

prompts.title: Resume Bullet Points
prompts.prompt_text: Rewrite this job responsibility into a strong achievement-based bullet point using action verbs: [Paste Text]
prompts.example_output: Transformed 'Sales manager' to 'Spearheaded sales strategy resulting in 20% growth...'

prompts.title: Polite Email Decline
prompts.prompt_text: Write a polite email declining this invitation while keeping the door open for future opportunities: [Context]
